statements: DELETE FROM ProductQualityMonitoring WHERE inspection_result = 'Fail' AND inspection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TestResults WHERE test_passed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Inspections WHERE id = 101 AND inspection_passed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM TestResults WHERE test_date < '2023-01-01' AND test_passed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM ProductInspections WHERE inspection_id = 5 AND inspector_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM InspectionMetrics WHERE metric_name = 'Quality Control' AND metric_value > 75;
DELETE FROM inspectors WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM test_results WHERE inspection_id = 100 AND test_name = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM inspection_history WHERE inspector_id = 500 AND history_date < '2022-01-01';
